title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:

sdumitriu - (11:51): vmassol: How's the release going?  
vmassol - (12:40): sdumitriu: progressing slowly when I get a few minutes  
vmassol - (12:41): right now blocked by a failing test in mailsender plugin  
spliffy\_ joined #xwiki at 12:42

rrodriguez joined #xwiki at 20:57  
sdumitriu left at 21:26 (Ping timeout: 265 seconds  
Denis joined #xwiki at 21:27  
florinciu left at 21:36 (Read error: Connection reset by peer  
rrodriguez left at 21:46 (Quit: rrodriguez  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 22:03  
vmassol - (22:18): guys if you want to help, the release notes for XE 2.6RC2 is here: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise26RC2  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 22:35  
sdumitriu - (22:36): vmassol: Upgrading myxwiki, the collection plugin doesn't work anymore  
vmassol - (22:37): ok  
vmassol - (22:37): what broke?  
sdumitriu - (22:37): rendering API  
sdumitriu - (22:37): org.xwiki.rendering.listener.Attachment  
vmassol - (22:37): ah it's using rendering, didn't know that  
sdumitriu - (22:37): Me neither  
sdumitriu - (22:38): OK, myxwiki is back up  
sdumitriu - (22:39): Upgrading the xar  
vmassol - (22:39): you're upgrading to 2.6RC2?  
sdumitriu - (22:40): Yes  
vmassol - (22:40): cool  
sdumitriu - (22:41): BTW, locally it seems to work  
vmassol - (22:41): cool  
sdumitriu - (22:41): I'll reply to the mail once I test SharePage on myxwiki  
vmassol - (22:41): k  
vmassol - (22:43): would be great if raluca or caty could update http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/ActivityMacro  
rrodriguez joined #xwiki at 22:47  
sdumitriu - (22:55): vmassol: SharePage works perfectly on www.myxwiki.org  
vmassol - (22:56): cool, btw did you fix the pb?  
sdumitriu - (22:56): Unfortunately, the entry appears in the menu only if the wiki is updated, to include the XWiki.SharePage document  
vmassol - (22:56): it doesn't work on mac and on ipv6 systems  
vmassol - (22:56): (I couldn't make it work)  
sdumitriu - (22:56): No, I didn't have time to fix it  
vmassol - (22:56): maybe I should start the vm with the ipv4 config property  
sdumitriu - (22:56): The problem is that I'm using $request.localName  
vmassol - (22:56): the one we use for jgroups too  
sdumitriu - (22:57): Which normally should be the same as the one I'm using  
vmassol - (22:57): I don'tknow if it would help  
sdumitriu - (22:57): But when it's localhost it gets changed to the canonical host name  
vmassol - (22:57): btw if you could put a different screenshot on the release notes page that would be great  
sdumitriu - (22:57): Which is 127.0.0.1 on IPv4  
vmassol - (22:57): I'll add the warning about ipv6 to the RN  
sdumitriu - (22:57): But 0:0:0...:0:1 on IPv6, which isn't valid as a mail address  
vmassol - (22:58): ok I'm done on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ReleaseNotesXWikiEnterprise26RC2  
sdumitriu - (22:58): vmassol: OK about the screenshot  
vmassol - (22:58): please review and add stuff if need be  
sdumitriu - (23:01): Hm, myxwiki still hangs on mysql sockets...  
vmassol - (23:04): ok I'll wait for more feedback about XE 26RC2 before publishing it to ow2 and on the download page  
sdumitriu - (23:06): The "not logged in on first request" bug is still present  
vmassol - (23:06): yes  
vmassol - (23:06): unfortunately  
vmassol - (23:11): sdumitriu: just got your mail, it's really nice  
vmassol - (23:11): well done for the content/layout  
vmassol - (23:12): sdumitriu: not sure we need the "To visit this document online, open http://www.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/ in your browser." part though  
sdumitriu - (23:12): Thanks  
vmassol - (23:12): since there's alreayd a link to it on the line before  
sdumitriu - (23:12): That's more for the text-only version  
sdumitriu - (23:12): Where there's no link above  
vmassol - (23:12): I see  
sdumitriu - (23:13): In the HTML version indeed it's not that useful  
sdumitriu - (23:13): Still, I kept it since I've seen lots of mails using the full address  
sdumitriu - (23:13): It's useful for those that have the bad habit of printing emails :(  
vmassol - (23:14): it's suprising you want to make life easier for them ;)  
vmassol - (23:14): (kidding)  
sdumitriu - (23:25): vmassol: One problem is that l10n.xwiki.org doesn't handle Mail objects nicely  
sdumitriu - (23:25): So it's not that easy to translate the mail content  
vmassol - (23:25): I see, we should talk to tmortagne about it  
vmassol - (23:25): maybe he's thought about it  
vmassol - (23:26): sdumitriu: build failing for lucene plugin apparently  
sdumitriu - (23:27): Hm, worked locally  
sdumitriu - (23:28): Hm, now it fails  
sdumitriu - (23:29): Oh, fixing it, my bad  
sdumitriu - (23:32): Fixed  
spliffy\_ left at 23:34 (Quit: Lost terminal
